## PR Checklist

Please verify that your Pull Request meets the following requirements:

- [ ] Commit message follows our guidelines:
      https://github.com/catbee-technologies/catbee-docs/blob/main/.commitlintrc.mjs
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and `npm run build` locally
- [ ] Documentation content has been checked for accuracy and clarity
- [ ] No broken links or build errors

---

## PR Type

What kind of change does this PR introduce?

- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] New documentation page
- [ ] Fixing typos or formatting
- [ ] Docusaurus config/layout changes
- [ ] Build/CI changes
- [ ] Other (please describe below)
